name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Rescue-Palooza! (Fan Game)
name_original: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Rescue-Palooza! (Fan Game)
description: It’s Pizza Time! Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Rescue-Palooza is a free fan-made beat-em-up game based on the TMNT! An update and homage to the classic NES titles, with tons of characters playable for the first time!
